front.title: IEEE Standard for Learning Technology-Data Model for Reusable Competency Definitions

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: This Standard defines a data model for describing, referencing, and sharing competency definitions, primarily in the context of online and distributed learning. This Standard provides a way to represent formally the key characteristics of a competency, independently of its use in any particular context. It enables interoperability among learning systems that deal with competency information by providing a means for them to refer to common definitions with common meanings.
